synopsis: In episode #7 of Pineapple Plant Rotation, hosts Devam and Ahir delve into the complexities of self-judgment and the pain that often accompanies personal growth. They share their own experiences of navigating emotional turmoil, emphasizing the importance of accepting one's vulnerabilities and learning to live authentically amidst life's challenges.
quotes: You are loved solely where you may show weakness without provoking the strength.
I always wait too long to do every single thing.
The body is in pain, we never feel the need to fight against that; we accept it, but when the mind's in pain, we see it as a personal failing.
Life can only be lived forwards but can only be understood backwards.
You can't please everyone; you need to trust the people who are right for you to accept you as you are.
Sometimes you just have to allow yourself to feel weak.
There is such a feeling of peace that comes with allowing your mind to feel weak.
I was so focused on living the life that I should that it blinded me from understanding who I really was.
You can't heal everybody; that's just not possible.
Your hardest isn't always good enough, and that's just fucking life.
